thing-type.label: Loxone Miniserver
thing-type.description: IP gateway for Loxone Smarthome system

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Host address or IP of the Loxone Miniserver

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: HTTP Port
parameter.description: HTTP Web interface port of the Loxone Miniserver

parameter.name: httpsPort
parameter.label: HTTPS Port
parameter.description: HTTPS Web interface port of the Loxone Miniserver

parameter.name: authMethod
parameter.label: Authorization Method
parameter.description: Method used to authorize user in the Miniserver

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: User
parameter.description: User name on the Loxone Miniserver

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: User password on the Loxone Miniserver. In token-based authentication this password will be cleared after token is acquired.

parameter.name: authToken
parameter.label: Token
parameter.description: Token acquired by the binding from the Miniserver. Applicable only in token-based authentication mode.

parameter.name: webSocketType
parameter.label: WebSocket Connection Type
parameter.description: Protocol used to communicate over WebSocket to the Miniserver

parameter.name: firstConDelay
parameter.label: First Connection Delay
parameter.description: Time between binding initialization and first connection attempt (seconds, 0-120)

parameter.name: keepAlivePeriod
parameter.label: Period Between Connection Keep-alive Messages
parameter.description: Time between sending two consecutive keep-alive messages (seconds, 1-600)

parameter.name: connectErrDelay
parameter.label: Connect Error Delay
parameter.description: Time between failed websocket connect attempts (seconds, 0-600)

parameter.name: responseTimeout
parameter.label: Miniserver Response Timeout
parameter.description: Time to wait for a response from Miniserver to a request sent from the binding (seconds, 0-60)

parameter.name: userErrorDelay
parameter.label: Authentication Error Delay
parameter.description: Time in seconds between user login error as a result of wrong name/password or no authority and next connection attempt (seconds, 0-3600)

parameter.name: comErrorDelay
parameter.label: Communication Error Delay
parameter.description: Time between connection close (as a result of some communication error) and next connection attempt (seconds, 0-3600)

parameter.name: maxBinMsgSize
parameter.label: Maximum Binary Message Size (kB)
parameter.description: Websocket client's maximum binary message size in kB

parameter.name: maxTextMsgSize
parameter.label: Maximum Text Message Size (kB)
parameter.description: Websocket client's maximum text message size in kB
